headline: PTC Integrates MBD Capabilities to Enhance Engineering Design Capabilities
summary: PTC Inc. (NASDAQ:PTC) is one of the 12 best-augmented reality stocks to buy, according to analysts. On June 12, the company announced model-based definition (MBD) capabilities within its Onshape computer-aided design CAD and product data management platform. MBD in Onshape becomes the first MBD offering within the cloud-native solution that enables engineering teams to create […]
